title: Add RAJAT50 and MATHS30 discount codes

requirements.summary: Add RAJAT50 (50%) and MATHS30 (30%) discount codes to UpiPaymentStep validation logic alongside existing codes
acceptanceCriteria: Entering RAJAT50 in the discount code field applies a 50% discount to the booking total
Entering MATHS30 in the discount code field applies a 30% discount to the booking total
Existing codes SAVE10 (10%) and SUMMER20 (20%) continue to work correctly
Invalid codes still show an appropriate error message
The discounted final amount is correctly reflected in the payment summary and booking confirmation

file_operations.description: Update the discount code validation logic to include two new codes: RAJAT50 with 50% discount and MATHS30 with 30% discount. Extend the existing validDiscountCodes object (currently containing SAVE10: 10 and SUMMER20: 20) to include RAJAT50: 50 and MATHS30: 30. Ensure the validation, discount calculation, and final amount display logic correctly handle all four codes.

requirements.summary: Update DiscountCodeManager admin UI to display RAJAT50 and MATHS30 alongside existing codes
acceptanceCriteria: Admin discount codes panel lists RAJAT50 with 50% label
Admin discount codes panel lists MATHS30 with 30% label
All four codes (SAVE10, SUMMER20, RAJAT50, MATHS30) are visible in the admin view

file_operations.description: Update the admin discount code display to include RAJAT50 (50%) and MATHS30 (30%) in the list of active discount codes. Ensure the UI renders all four codes (SAVE10, SUMMER20, RAJAT50, MATHS30) with their corresponding discount percentages and active/inactive status indicators. The display should clearly show each code's name and discount percentage for admin visibility.
